page.title: 04The Council Offices.
page.content: The housing dept. deals with the number of houses to be built. They do this by having a survey, counting how many people come into the borough and then deciding how many houses to build. When they have done that they ask building companies to estimate the price and they choose the cheapest one. Housing maintainance is very expensive. Most of the money is for the workers salary. The recreation dept. deals with leisure centres and parks. There are four leisure centres in Islwyn. It is very expensive maintaining parks and leisure centres, parks being the more expensive to maintain. There is a lot of damage caused by vandals in parks, but hardly any in leisure centres because they are manned all day. The enviromental health dept. ensures that our area is as healthy and beneficial as possible.
